title: Stage Lv8-C1-S03
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Should you need help, please contact me.
Were I in your position, I would accept the offer.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Should you need help, please contact me.

sentences.kr: 제가 당신 입장이라면 그 제안을 받아들이겠습니다.
sentences.en: Were I in your position, I would accept the offer.

sentences.kr: 미리 말씀해 주셨다면 도울 수 있었을 텐데요.
sentences.en: Had you told me earlier, I could have helped.

sentences.kr: 더 많은 정보가 필요하시면 저에게 알려주세요.
sentences.en: Should you require more information, please let me know.

sentences.kr: 그가 더 일찍 왔더라면 회의에 참석할 수 있었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had he arrived earlier, he could have attended the meeting.

sentences.kr: 제가 더 젊다면 그 도전을 받아들이겠습니다.
sentences.en: Were I younger, I would take on that challenge.
Should there be any changes, please inform us immediately.

sentences.kr: 더 많은 시간이 있었다면 더 나은 결과를 얻을 수 있었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we had more time, we could have achieved better results.
